Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw two people communicating using a string telephone over a distance.
The student can include features in their drawing that demonstrate the use of sound to send information through the string.
The student can only show the materials provided, like cups and string, in their drawing.
The student can illustrate how the string connects the two cups to communicate effectively.
The student can depict in their drawing how communicating over a distance using the string telephone is similar to how technology helps people communicate.
